alert.note: Alert for Adams; Arapahoe; Elbert; Lincoln; Morgan; Washington (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued October 23 at 10:10AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY HEALTH ADVISORY FOR BLOWING DUST FROM 1000 AM SUNDAY UNTIL 800 PM SUNDAY... The Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment has issued the following... WHAT...Air Quality Health Advisory for Blowing Dust. WHERE...Morgan, Washington, Yuma, Elbert, Lincoln, Kit Carson, Cheyenne, Pueblo, Crowley, Otero, Kiowa, Bent, Prowers, Las Animas, Baca, and eastern portions of Adams, Arapahoe, El Paso, and Huerfano counties. Locations include, but are not limited to, Fort Morgan, Akron, Wray, Kiowa, Hugo, Burlington, Cheyenne Wells, Pueblo, Ordway, La Junta, Eads, Las Animas, Lamar, Trinidad, Springfield, and Walsenburg WHEN...1000 AM Sunday October 23 to 800 PM Sunday October 23 IMPACTS...Strong and gusty winds will produce areas of blowing dust on Sunday. The threat for blowing dust will gradually diminish by Sunday evening. HEALTH INFORMATION...Public Health Recommendations: Increasing likelihood of respiratory symptoms in sensitive individuals, aggravation of heart or lung disease and premature mortality in people with cardiopulmonary disease and older adults. People with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should reduce prolonged or heavy exertion.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Arapahoe; Elbert; Lincoln; Morgan; Washington
